PreceptDef.label: desired
PreceptDef.description: Water is not just a necessity; it is a sacred medium for renewal and purity. The presence of bathtubs and showers reflects our devotion to cleanliness, both physical and spiritual. To neglect such facilities is to fall into disgrace, while their abundance brings harmony and joy.
